sourcesContent: import { Box, Card, CardContent, CircularProgress, Typography, List, ListItem, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' export default function UsersComponent(props) { const { gitUsers, loading, errorMessage } = props; console.log(gitUsers) return ( Git User Info Search Result { loading && ()} {errorMessage && ({errorMessage} couldn't fetch data)} {gitUsers && ( <> Name: {" "}{gitUsers.name} Username: {" "}{gitUsers.location} UserId: {" "}{gitUsers.name} Location: {" "}{gitUsers.location} Blog: {" "}{gitUsers.avatar ? gitUsers.avatar : 'No Blog' } Public Repos: {" "}{gitUsers.publicRepos } Followers: {" "}{gitUsers.followers ? gitUsers.followers : 'None'} Following: {" "}{gitUsers.following ? gitUsers.following : 'None' } Avatar: {" "}{gitUsers.avatar} Bio: {" "}{gitUsers.bio} Company: {" "}{gitUsers.company ? gitUsers.company : 'None at the moment'} Visit Git Profile: {" "}{gitUsers.url} )} ) }
